title: Android 10 Messages Issue
content:
Hi all

This could be a little hard to explain, but I'll give it a shot. If I'm using the Android Messages app, in the main menu/conversation list, then receive a new sms/messages notification, the app will become unresponsive until the little "messages" notification animation is finished on the notification bar. The app will then function as usual until I receive another notification, at which point it will become unresponsive until the animation is finished.

Has anyone else experienced this issue? and if so, does anyone know of a fix? Very frustrating!

Sorry if the explanation is a little rough...

Thanks in advance.
